rows.label: tlk70000050_03_msg0001
rows.name:
I hope you know I'm always grateful
to have your help!

rows.label: tlk70000050_03_msg0002
rows.name:
Thanks to you the militia's numbers
have grown, but, well, that also means
our food problems have gotten worse...

rows.label: tlk70000050_03_msg0003
rows.name:
We're trying as hard as we can to be
self-sufficient, but it's just been hard
with everything else going on.

rows.label: tlk70000050_03_msg0004
rows.name:
I'm a bit worried about how things are
going to turn out if this situation
continues. Our reserves are low.

rows.label: tlk70000050_03_msg0005
rows.name:
I won't be able to snack as much as I'd
like... Um, I mean, nothing! Just forget
I said anything! Nothing to see here!
